user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I need to cater to different dietary preferences. Can you recommend some vegetarian and gluten-free recipes that are easy to prepare and serve a large group? Also, suggest some popular food categories and provide me with the plant hardiness zone for our office location.

TaskList.description: Research vegetarian and gluten-free recipes suitable for large groups.
Compile a list of popular food categories for event catering.
Determine the plant hardiness zone for the office location.
